text: وقال فرعون ائتونى بكل سحر عليم

translations.translation: Bring the cleverest magicians to me," said the Pharaoh.
And Pharaoh said (to his) men: 'Bring every skilled sorcerer to me.'
The Pharaoh ordered every skillful magician to come into his presence.
And Firaun said, “Bring every expert magician to me.”
And Fir`awn said: "Bring me every well-versed sorcerer."
And Firon said: Bring to me every skillful magician.
Pharaoh said, 'Bring me every cunning sorcerer.'
And Pharaoh said: Bring every cunning wizard unto me.
Then Pharaoh said, "Bring me every skilled magician!"
And Firawn said: bring unto me every magician knowing.
Pharaoh said, ‘Bring me every expert magician.’
Said Pharaoh: "Bring me every sorcerer well versed."
And Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "Bring to me every well-versed sorcerer."
Pharaoh said, “Bring me every experienced sorcerer.”
And Pharaoh said, "Bring to me every learned magician."
[10:79]   And Pharaoh said, ‘Bring me every cunning sorcerer’, [every] individual excelling in the art of sorcery.
(And Pharaoh said: Bring every cunning) every skilful (wizard unto me).

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما أفحموا عنه براهينهما وحججهما، وعجزوا عن معجزاتهما صمموا العزم لمعارضتهما؛ حيث { قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ } آمراً لأعوانه وأنصاره: { ٱئْتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَاحِرٍ عَلِيمٍ } [يونس: 79] ما هر كامل فيه، فأرسلوا شُرَطاً لجميع أهل السحر، فأجمعوا واجتمعوا وجاءوا على فناء فرعون مجتمعين، ثمَّ عينوا الوقت والموعد، فخرجوا إلأيه ليعارضوا معهما
